name: Water Conservation Rebates
description: Rebates for irrigation systems, lawn replacement, faucets, toilets, and more; plus free conservation kit
fullDescription: Cal Water offers a variety of rebates for water-saving products and landscape improvements, plus free conservation kits to help customers reduce water usage and lower bills.
whatTheyOffer:
- High-efficiency toilet rebates
- Smart irrigation controller rebates
- Lawn replacement/turf conversion rebates
- High-efficiency faucet rebates
- Free water conservation kit
- Leak detection resources
- Various seasonal promotions
howToGetIt:
1. Verify you're a Cal Water customer
2. Browse available rebates on website
3. Check product eligibility requirements
4. Purchase qualifying water-saving product
5. Submit rebate application with proof of purchase
6. Request free conservation kit separately
keywords: Cal Water, water rebate, toilet, irrigation, lawn replacement, turf conversion, showerhead, faucet, conservation kit, water savings
